name: HighLevel
description: Convenience builders, routers, collectors and managers that simplify common tasks like command routing, components, views, and sharding.

notable_components.name: SlashCommandRouter
notable_components.purpose: Register and dispatch slash command handlers.

notable_components.name: ComponentCollector
notable_components.purpose: Collect component interactions for a message or view.

usage_example: Use `SlashCommandBuilder` to register commands and `SlashCommandRouter` to handle incoming interactions. See Examples/SlashBot.swift.
